name: The Flying Sun - Adventure Game
description:
One day the Sun fell from the sky, and you now need to bring it back to see the Sunrise again :)

Just set up the speed and click on the sun ball. You pick up various achievements rising to the top and touching the ground!

Collect as many coins as you can for achievements and power-ups, they will help you improve your level and accomplish this task!

Game Features:

  • FREE
  • Great achievements
  • Powerful boosters
  • Simple and fun
  • Kids-friendly
  • Nice graphics

Don't miss out on playing free The Flying Sun Adventure Game!
